name: Liferay Development
short_description:
Liferay development training will be new Self Paced Training proved and benefit and experienced operators of excavators by showing safe applications efficient and productive with different techniques to improve the safe operation of excavators. New excavator operators, who are properly trained, will benefit from industry recognition, skills training and self paced training, liferay theme development training courses.
Let's take a look at the topics covered in this particular training: 
   Introduction to Liferay
    Introduction to Liferay Plugins Development
    Installation of Liferay, MySQL, Plugins SDK &   Eclipse IDE
    Understanding Liferay Theme
    Overview of Liferay Theme Development
    Theme Development
    CSS
    JQuery
    Velocity
    Java Script
summary: Liferay development training will be new Self Paced Training proved
